subject: Horse Racing
California Chrome (Race Horse)
Arlington Million (Horse Race)
lead_paragraph: After a minor injury forced the reigning American Horse of the Year to miss his start at Royal Ascot, his trainer and co-owner remained optimistic about his next start.
snippet: After a minor injury forced the reigning American Horse of the Year to miss his start at Royal Ascot, his trainer and co-owner remained optimistic about his next start.
